title: Frind
description: Frind is a social media concept whose objective is to promote reciprocal interaction both virtual and face-to-face. This project addresses the creation of the brand and brand guidelines, and a visual approach to the user interface. The whole visual proposal aims to communicate and promote connections by highlighting the human component, inspired by trust, hug, smile, inclusion and Frind’s core values.

title: Ikigai Sanchi
description: Ikigai Sanchi offers gastronomic entrepreneurs a shared production center with high-tech equipment at affordable costs. The idea was to create a brand identity that evokes the colors of fire and the elegance of black in simple and clean lines, generating a modern aesthetic.

title: myTime
description: This design challenge consisted on designing a personal calendar App. Proposing a flow and interface is smart enough to suggest meeting times, accounts for changing time zones, and is proactively working for users who struggle to keep up with their calendars.

title: #NowPlaying in
description: This was a personal exercise of a fast design concept starting with some given wireframes. The idea was to build a web to tweet and display music from users all over the world using the hashtag #NowPlaying. My goal was to achieve a modern look that somehow evoke a relation with Twitter but creating its own identity.

title: Online Casino Games
description: UX/UI - Web Redesign. In this new proposal, the idea was to give a more modern look to the page. Also, trying to add more white space to the design since is a section with a lot of information. This was achieved by using elements like cards, modal buttons and carousels to reduce the amount of information appearing at first sight.

title: Yoga Isaac Ambel
description: Isaac Ambel Yoga is a Yoga instructor based in Badajoz, Spain. The objective of the page was to share his trajectory as well as his approach to yoga, and to give information about the classes he impart in two different yoga centers in the city. The client wanted his web page to reflect peace and calm, also to show yoga both as a physical and a spiritual activity, but always keeping a modern and clean look.

title: Infinite Love
description: Infinite Love is a Jewelery brand based in Trujillo Perú, inspired by brands like Cartier, Graff and Gucci. The client wanted an elegant but modern page.  A very clean and clear website that let the product take protagonism and transmit luxuriousness. The colors were choosen according to the logo and the typographies give the design a delicate and sophisticated touch.

title: Llama Path
description: Llama Path is a professional tour operator based in Cusco, Peru. They offer a variety of treks and tours all over Peru, including the Inca Trail and a variety of alternative treks to Machu Picchu. They wanted to keep the structure and colors from their old website but giving a much modern and cleaner look.
